name: Super Frog Boi
description:
Hey I'm Robsoma and this is my first venture into making a game, so please be gentle ;-).

Just a simple infinite runner with a retro 2D look. I'll be adding a global leader board in soon and if there are any other tweaks you'd like just let me know. 

Hope you enjoy :-)

Controls - 

Left Click or Space = Jump.

Hold longer to jump higher.

Double press for double jump.

Escape = Pause.
